lead_paragraph: The search giant apologized and rushed to fix its Google Photos after the service mistakenly labeled photos of black people as “gorillas.”

headline.main: Google App Mislabels Black People as ‘Gorillas’
headline.print_headline: Google Apologizes for Flaw on App

snippet: The search giant apologized and rushed to fix its Google Photos after the service mistakenly labeled photos of black people as “gorillas.”
